issue.title: [Rust] Remove useless use of `format!`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2413](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2413). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Running clippy on Arrow's Rust implementation shows a number of places where `format!` is being called when it isn't necessary.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2413?focusedCommentId=16430388) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1849
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1849>
